All actors in this movie did a fabulous job and their acting and screen presence will be remembered for ages. Dialogues of the movie written by Milap Zaveri were top notch. One of the best movie of John Abraham and sonu sood. Manoj Vajpaaye looks like a badass don with his looks and killer dialogues. Anil Kapoor makes a remarkable comeback along with Ronit Roy. All actors in this movie did a fabulous job and their acting and screen presence will be remembered for ages. Dialogues of the movie written by Milap Zaveri were top notch. BGM by Amar Mohile was satisfactory. Songs in this movie were of same type and so I ignored some of the them.
The thing I didn't like with this movie was forcefully inserted,excessive and cheap slang languages. This was simply irritating for some part. John Abraham could have stopped Director and Dialogue writer to avoid slang languages. Screenplay of the movie could have better with better editing. 
Ratings:7/10.
